Reviews.Title: A little better than expected.
Reviews.Author: Jamie R. Wright "o.o."
Reviews.Content: They didn't say hardly anything in the ad.I took a chance because I wanted to finally be able to take some decent pics this summer.The only trouble I had was trying to find out if it had the charger and also the shipping.I had to up-grade the shipping just to get things started.This is the second time I've had to do this with Amazon.It's getting pretty old and expensive.

ProductInfo.Features: Sony Cybershot DSC-T9 6MP Digital Camera with 3x Optical Image Stabilization Zoom (Black)
ProductInfo.Name: Sony Cybershot DSC-T9 6MP Digital Camera with 3x Optical Image Stabilization Zoom (Black)
